text: Sorry, I never worked with this plugin. However I can recommend my friend <@UBRG1R3EW> and his plugin <https://www.unific.com>

Hello,
I want to do an API call from a custom code using js.
Calling the search API to look for contacts in a deal that have contact type = customer.
Using this get api :
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/search/query?q=testingapis&hapikey=demo>```
How can i call this api from my custom code action using js ?

Thank you for thinking of us <@UN7CEHC9X> !

<@U02FZE4AF7Z> Unific can sync custom attributes into any property in HubSpot as long as itâ€™s on the same object type (customer to contact, or order to deal, or M2 product to HubSpot product )
Let me know if it makes sense to hop on a demo call

one potential problem may be the `idProperty`, but in addition to the one used in the request snippet above, I've tried `id` as well as `item_id`. I got `hs_object_id` from the properties manager, so I'm pretty sure that's correct. Any help is appreciated!
